section.p: This template represents the sender (author) and receivers (participants) of a handoff communication in a plan of treatment. It does not convey details about the communication. The "handoff" process involves senders, those transmitting the patient's information and releasing the care of that patient to the next clinician, and receivers, those who accept the patient information and care of that patient.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-30834, CONF:1098-30835 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.141"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-30832)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-30833)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-30836)/@code="432138007" handoff communication (procedure) (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1098-30837, CONF:1098-30838)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31668)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31669)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-31670)
The effective time is the time when the handoff process took place between the sender and receiver of the patient information. This could be the time the information was transmitted, released, or verbally communicated to the next clinician.

SHALL contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31672)
The Author Participant contains the sender's contact information and is a resource for the Information Recipient for any follow-up questions.
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] participant such that it (CONF:1098-31673)
Documentation of the Information Recipient's name and address verifies that the information was exchanged.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="IRCP" (CONF:1098-31674)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-31675)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32422)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-31676)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1098-32392)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1098-32393)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:1098-32394)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-30832)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-30833)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-30836)/@code="432138007" handoff communication (procedure) (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT) (CONF:1098-30837, CONF:1098-30838)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31668)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31669)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-31670)
The effective time is the time when the handoff process took place between the sender and receiver of the patient information. This could be the time the information was transmitted, released, or verbally communicated to the next clinician.

SHALL contain [1..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31672)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)
The Author Participant contains the sender's contact information and is a resource for the Information Recipient for any follow-up questions.

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] participant such that it (CONF:1098-31673)
Documentation of the Information Recipient's name and address verifies that the information was exchanged.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="IRCP" (CONF:1098-31674)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-31675)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-32422)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-31676)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] addr (CONF:1098-32392)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] playingEntity such that it (CONF:1098-32393)
SHALL contain at least one [1..*] name (CONF:1098-32394)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="ACT" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.141"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.141"/> <code code="432138007" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT" displayName="handoff communication (procedure)"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="1712738079"/> <code code="1557342444"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <participant typeCode="IRCP"> <participantRole> <id root="MDHT" extension="1446572013"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.101" codeSystemName="NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy"/> <addr/> <playingEntity/> </participantRole> </participant> </act>
